successes.title: Small World 2: The Return!
successes.description: Your favorite fantasy board game on Android Tablets, PCs (Steam) - and iPads too... Read on!

Pledges.description: Kobolds - Gain access to our private Small World 2 discussion forum, with the Kobolds forum badge, throughout the development of the game.

Tritons - Unlock the Kickstarter backer digital bonus pack, a set of 3 new races & 3 new powers developed by Philippe Keyaerts specially for Small World 2, + access to our discussion forum, with the Tritons forum badge. 
Only makes sense for existing Small World iPad users; otherwise, please check our Skeletons pledge instead!

Skeletons - Get a digital download of Small World 2 on one platform of your choice (Android tablet, Kindle Fire, Steam-running PC or iPad) + the Kickstarter backer digital bonus pack + access to our Private Forum, with the Skeletons forum badge.

Goblins - Receive a 6 player cardboard map for Small World the board game, featuring Small World on one side / Underground on the other + a digital download of Small World 2 on one platform of your choice + the Kickstarter backer digital bonus pack + access to our Private Forum, with the Goblins forum badge.

Orcs - Receive the Small World Pocket Encyclopedia, a hardcover notebook filled with 84+ full-color pages of concept art, illustrations, strategic advice and trivia surrounding the denizens of Small World + the 6 player cardboard map + a digital download of Small World 2 on one platform of your choice + the Kickstarter backer digital bonus pack + access to our Private Forum, with the Orcs forum badge.

Spiderines - Design the Race or mini-expansion of your choice; we will professionally illustrate it, lay it, print it, and who knows? - maybe even publish it or code it into the game! -; a framed print-out of your Race or mini-expansion sheet signed by Artist Miguel Coimbra and Game Designer Philippe Keyaerts; and a listing of your name with the Avatar illustration of your choice in both the digital game and the Small World Pocket Encyclopedia + all rewards from the Orcs level, with a Spiderines forum badge.
